lead_paragraph: A British man who joined a jihadist group to fight in Syria and then returned to Britain after faking his death has pleaded guilty to four terrorism offenses, the London police said.
snippet: A British man who joined a jihadist group to fight in Syria and then returned to Britain after faking his death has pleaded guilty to four terrorism offenses, the London police said.

headline.main: Britain: Man Pleads Guilty to Terrorism Charges
headline.print_headline: Britain: Man Pleads Guilty to Terrorism Charges
